amendment.description: At the end of division E (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the construction or expansion of detention facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 84 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to prohibit funding from being used to expand or build new detention facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 230 (Roll no. 466).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A045) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 230 (Roll no. 466).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
